programme.desc: Rex, Tomo, Viki, Ping, and Rocky, a group of dinosaurs, team up to explore and find new friends on planet M25.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the worlds greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.sub-title: Return of the Queen - Kembalinya Maharani
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) An XTREME start to the biggest new series of Beyblade! Beyblade pros from around the world gather to compete in the Pro League held inside the X Tower!

programme.title: Miniforce Animaltron
programme.sub-title: New Members of Space Police, Tri Cop!
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Across the galaxy, a monster tribe called "Egg King," which had been observed in "Animal Planet," scattered around Earth. Lion, the Prince of Animaltron, and his friends came to Earth to catch Egg King monsters. Animaltron and Miniforce join forces to protect Earth!

programme.title: Miniforce Animaltron
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Across the galaxy, a monster tribe called "Egg King," which had been observed in "Animal Planet," scattered around Earth. Lion, the Prince of Animaltron, and his friends came to Earth to catch Egg King monsters. Animaltron and Miniforce join forces to protect Earth!

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Instead of going to bed like all the other children, when our heroes get their pyjamas on, they magically transform into super heroes and become the PJ Masks!

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: Space Nova is an exciting and captivating space adventure which follows the Nova familys search for alien life throughout the universe.

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.sub-title: Icons That Made Us : Toys and Games That Made Us
programme.desc: "Icons That Shaped Us" explores the unforgettable pop culture moments that defined growing up in Singapore and shaped our identity. What made these icons so impactful?

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.sub-title: What To Do About Cluttered Corridors? Part 2
programme.desc: Talking Point is an English current affairs programme available across Mediacorp’s network. With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates current issues and events, offering diverse perspectives on local stories and exploring their impact on viewers.

programme.title: Donals Irish Adventure
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as youve never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galways picturesque oasis.

programme.title: The Chefs Line
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chefs Line?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. This series involves former high-achieving contestants from the past eleven series of MasterChef Australia, returning for another chance at the title of MasterChef and a prize of A$250,000

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australias most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: I Can See Your Voice Singapore
programme.desc: Celebrity detectives Gurmit Singh, Najip Ali, Benjamin Kheng and guest detectives Class95s Yasminne Cheng and Makan Kaki and Gold 905 DJ Denise Tan, help celebrity contestant Broadway Beng, Sebastian Tan separate the good singers from the bad.

programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Former socialite and much-reviled Tess, is released from 10 years of imprisonment for attempting to murder her wealthy husband by poisoning, shes now back to atone for the past, retrieve her children and find out the truth of who framed her.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Best Telenovela - National Winner Asian Academy Creative Awards (2020) | Kin is a drama about the complexities of life, love and family relationships. Years have passed since Yoke and Ella had their lives turned upside-down when they returned to be with their rightful families after having been swapped at birth. Years later, Yoke has seemingly embraced her role as a status-conscious, high society Shelley, assuming a leadership role in the family business. Ella has accepted her fate as a member of the salt of the earth, working-class Loh family but struggles to make something of her life. Has the nature vs nurture battle run its course or are relationships between the families still as fraught and complicated as ever? The Lohs, Shelleys, Hassans, and Balas have overcome personal loss, incarceration, as well as estrangement of their loved ones; yet lingering tensions remain. Mysteries continue to unfold as characters pursue their individual agendas, while emotional drama abounds as surprising twists are revealed that threaten the stability to which they have become accustomed..

programme.title: Every Body Knows
programme.sub-title: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome-Hand and Wrist Pain
programme.desc: What is carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS) and what are its causes, prevention and cure? And imagine the shock for our host Mike Kasem as hes diagnosed to be having this condition on the spot by specialist hand surgeon Dr Kevin Wong! With Zhu Zeliang from Yes! 933 and Haleema Asman from Oli 968 as guests.

programme.title: Love Shop
programme.desc: After her parents pass away in a car accident, Alex, a young university graduate, is forced to take over Love Shop- the family’s matchmaking business. Alex has always had somewhat of a vendetta against Love Shop: its nature of commodifying love stands against everything Alex believes in. Hopelessly alone now, she decides to take care of the matchmaking agency long enough to decide what to do with it. But time is running out: Alex has secured employment at a major advertising firm, and is slated to start work in 2 months. Through a circus of colourful characters and strange circumstances, Alex finds herself growing and bonding with the business, and comes to the realisation that it might not be the outright crass and shady business she always assumed it to be, but a legitimate outlet for souls in pursuit of companionship and better lives.

programme.title: La Brea

programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. programme.title: New Life Begins
programme.desc: Because of a marriage selection, girls from all over the world gather in Xin Chuan. Yin Zheng, one of the six young masters of Xin Chuan, who keeps a low profile, and Li Wei, who just wants to work hard and not get selected, live comfortably in this hometown. They unexpectedly form a relationship, and together start a new life where they encounter numerous situations and complement each other in overcoming them. 《卿卿日常》讲述了因为一场联姻擢选，来自天南海北的女孩们齐聚新川。韬光养晦的新川六少主尹峥（白敬亭饰），以及只想努力落选、好回老家安逸度日的李薇（田曦薇饰）意外结缘，共同开启了一段状况百出却又相映成趣的新生活。随着尹峥开府、上朝，二人逐渐口味相投、心意相通，携手共度三餐四季，并与其他性格命运各异的兄弟姐妹们相伴成长，一起书写着新川大家庭的温暖日常。

programme.title: The Way to Happiness
programme.desc: The Gao brothers, because of their completely different values, not only judge their achievements, but also educate their children with very different personalities and characters. The previous generation has information on the grievances and grievances of the previous generation, and the next generation has the pursuit and prospect of the next generation; on the intricate road ahead, everyone is diligently searching for their own happiness. 高家兄弟因为价值观截然不同，不但成就高低立判，连教育出来的子女，个性和品格也大相径庭。上一代有上一代的恩怨情报，下一代有下一代的追求展望;在错综复杂的人生大道上，每个人都汲汲营营，寻找着属于自己的幸福课题。

programme.title: Hello Singapore
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the days latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8.

programme.title: Let Me Take Your Pulse
programme.desc: A doctoral student of Traditional Chinese Medicine goes to a government TCM clinic to start from the bottom and to treat patients side by side with young doctors. The director of the clinic is an ex-girlfriend who does not agree with him. He is idealistic, she is realistic; the two grow together, and work together to change the status quo. 中医博士生辜清劲到政府中医诊所由低做起，跟年轻医师们并肩医治病患，诊所主任竟是跟他理念不合的前女友程嘉应；他理想，她现实，两人共同成长，连手改变现状。

programme.title: Camping Around The World
programme.desc: A reality series where celebrities head out on an overseas camping trip with a dear friend or a family member. On each trip, the campers are thrown out of their comfort zone, taking part in unique outdoor experiences and opening up to each other like never before. Offering a rare, revelatory look into the private lives of the star-studded cast, the show promises to be full of laughter and heart. 本地知名艺人们将携同一名伴侣，在国外展开前所未有的露营体验，挑战新颖户外活动，并对彼此前所未有的敞开心扉。请随同李铭顺、李铭忠、戚玉武、白薇秀、郑斌辉、谢韵仪、黄靖伦等，走进澳大利亚、韩国、不丹等国，展开时而让人开怀大笑，时而让人感到人间温暖的露营之旅。

programme.title: Another Wok of Life
programme.desc: Zhen Bang is finally released from jail. You Yi, owner of hotpot restaurant Hui Tou Lu, admires Zhen Bang’s character and offers him a job. Zhen Bang begins a new chapter of his life but faces challenges from all fronts, including a past that continues to haunt him. With the help of Buffett, a girl that he saved, and his peers from Hui Tou Lu, Zhen Bang ultimately finds hope, and love. 颜振邦因误杀罪入狱，刑满获释后，获得火锅店“回头炉”老板李有义的赏识，聘请他为厨房助手，由此展开新生活。无奈无良少东李自成的处处针对，同时面对家人的离弃，加上往事的阴影，让振邦感觉四面楚歌，幸好有他曾经帮助过的巴菲特伸出援手，两人过后还谱出一段恋曲，与回头炉的三名伙伴一起携手闯出一片蓝天......

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day.

programme.title: Travel Odd
programme.desc: Breaking away from the traditional hotel concept, the hosts travel around the world to experience unique and interesting accommodations. Not only are there hotels converted from old airplanes and shipping containers in Malaysia, but mushroom-shaped huts also catch the eye. Can an abandoned oil rig be transformed into a diving resort? The Dutch Canals Geng Pavilion has been converted into a detached house on the water, while a jib crane offers half-day crane accommodations.

programme.title: Fighting for Love
programme.desc: The story follows A Mai, a female general of the founding era of the Southern Xia dynasty, who discards her feminine attire and dons battle armor, enduring hardships to become a legendary female warrior. A Mai, the daughter of the Duke of Jingguo in Southern Xia, witnesses her entire family being killed by her childhood friend Chen Qi. Years later, A Mai, now a young woman, disguises herself as a man and roams the martial world, seeking revenge against Chen Qi.

programme.title: The Blood of Youth
programme.desc: As the martial arts world enters a new era, a generation of talented youth set out to prove themselves, venturing into a journey far greater than imagined. Ambitious and brave, they will stop at nothing to achieve their goals.

programme.title: Taste Of Satisfaction
programme.desc: A documentary film of Chinese Delicacies unique to Hongkongers. The show will present traditional culture, family, and nostalgia through different aspects of food in daily life. 香港是美食天堂，當中不乏地道的美味佳餚，如點心、燒味、小炒、火鍋等，皆是港人「滿足的味道」！主持黎諾懿因應每集主題，帶領大家尋訪具代表性的食店，感受各款招牌美食背後的情懷。從食物的選料、準備功夫、烹調方法，深入了解一道道港式美饌，如何蘊含着大廚的心思與執着。此外，節目請來本地著名美食家，娓娓道來「港味」盛載的獨特情感，呈現屬於你和我的香港之味。

programme.title: Kinship
programme.desc: Brothers, Chen Anping (Yao Wenlong) and Anxin (Chen Tianwen) run Da Ying Jia. Together, they expanded their foot reflexology centre from its humble beginnings to a successful chain-store. But beneath the calm surface of the 25 years family business lie secrets and struggles. Founder Anping continues working as a masseur and leaves business operations to Anxin; much to the chagrin of his wife, Meiqi (Xiang Yun), and adopted daughters, Jinsha ...

programme.title: Dishing With Chris Lee
programme.sub-title: Chantalle Ng, Xu Bin, Ayden Sng
programme.desc: Ah Ge Christopher Lee is back! Raised in a village, Christopher brings with him indelible childhood memories and exciting life experiences to a nostalgic kampong house where he reconnects with his younger self and different guests. An avid foodie and self-taught cook, Christopher whips up a few dishes to host his guests at the cozy and open kampong, where they share life stories over hearty meals. 在外地发展演艺事业的本地阿哥李铭顺回来了！从小在甘榜长大的铭顺，这次带着满满的童年回忆和人生历练来到熟悉的甘榜小屋。除了与儿时的自己重聚，每集也会邀请不同嘉宾朋友一同欢聚。热爱烹饪的铭顺将亲自下厨款待客人。做菜吃饭的同时，铭顺与嘉宾少不了谈天交心，分享生活，过程中品尝的不仅是美食，还有人生各种滋味。

programme.title: The Heartland Hero
programme.desc: Former loan shark Mao Ge had his leg broken by his enemy after he was released from prison. He started a second-hand goods business with Yiyuan, an ex-convict too. Qiu Jingwen, once a delinquent Mao Ge dated, sublet her toast shop space to Mao reluctantly. Jingwen’s cousin Qingtian, a prison officer, helps out at the toast shop and she is skeptical of Mao and Yiyuan turning over a new leaf... 人称猫哥的前阿窿刚出狱就被仇家打断腿，在好兄弟钟亿元出狱后，一起开了一家二手货店“邻里帮”。不得已把土司店面分租给猫哥的邱静雯，竟是当年和他一起出双入对的小太妹MoMo。静雯的表妹包晴天是监狱官，经常到店里帮忙，始终对猫哥和亿元存有偏见，不相信他们会坏人做好事。但谁说旧货与人生，重来一次不能更美？

programme.title: Taste Of Life
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. The previous generation has information on the grievances and grievances of the previous generation, and the next generation has the pursuit and prospect of the next generation; on the intricate road ahead, everyone is diligently searching for their own happiness. 高家兄弟因为价值观截然不同，不但成就高低立判，连教育出来的子女，个性和品格也大相径庭。上一代有上一代的恩怨情报，下一代有下一代的追求展望;在错综复杂的人生大道上，每个人都汲汲营营，寻找着属于自己的幸福课题。

programme.title: Hello Singapore
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the days latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8.

programme.title: Let Me Take Your Pulse
programme.desc: A doctoral student of Traditional Chinese Medicine goes to a government TCM clinic to start from the bottom and to treat patients side by side with young doctors. The director of the clinic is an ex-girlfriend who does not agree with him. He is idealistic, she is realistic; the two grow together, and work together to change the status quo. 中医博士生辜清劲到政府中医诊所由低做起，跟年轻医师们并肩医治病患，诊所主任竟是跟他理念不合的前女友程嘉应；他理想，她现实，两人共同成长，连手改变现状。

programme.title: Say It Right!
programme.desc: In this season, the influencers will participate throughout the series, with each episode focusing on a different theme. The influencers will need to complete a series of challenges closely related to the Chinese language. The production team hopes that both the participating influencers and the viewers can learn and master Chinese in a fun and engaging way.

programme.title: Tuesday Report : Tales Under The Tentage
programme.desc: Wayne Lim, a 40-year-old night market organizer with 17 years of experience, aims to modernize traditional night market. He introduces trendy foods, creates outdoor dining areas and uses insta-worthy wall and live streaming for promotion. Wayne values relationships and supports vendors by reducing rent, mentoring newcomers and offering spaces to second-hand peddlers from Sungei Road Flea Market.

programme.title: Another Wok of Life
programme.desc: Zhen Bang is finally released from jail. You Yi, owner of hotpot restaurant Hui Tou Lu, admires Zhen Bang’s character and offers him a job. Zhen Bang begins a new chapter of his life but faces challenges from all fronts, including a past that continues to haunt him. With the help of Buffett, a girl that he saved, and his peers from Hui Tou Lu, Zhen Bang ultimately finds hope, and love. 颜振邦因误杀罪入狱，刑满获释后，获得火锅店“回头炉”老板李有义的赏识，聘请他为厨房助手，由此展开新生活。无奈无良少东李自成的处处针对，同时面对家人的离弃，加上往事的阴影，让振邦感觉四面楚歌，幸好有他曾经帮助过的巴菲特伸出援手，两人过后还谱出一段恋曲，与回头炉的三名伙伴一起携手闯出一片蓝天......

programme.title: News Tonight

programme.title: Health 123
programme.desc: Through animated clips, a virtual family asks questions and discusses myths related to health. Join Western doctors, TCM physicians, and dietitians to educate yourself about various illnesses!

programme.title: Fighting for Love
programme.desc: The story follows A Mai, a female general of the founding era of the Southern Xia dynasty, who discards her feminine attire and dons battle armor, enduring hardships to become a legendary female warrior. A Mai, the daughter of the Duke of Jingguo in Southern Xia, witnesses her entire family being killed by her childhood friend Chen Qi. Years later, A Mai, now a young woman, disguises herself as a man and roams the martial world, seeking revenge against Chen Qi.

programme.title: The Blood of Youth
programme.desc: As the martial arts world enters a new era, a generation of talented youth set out to prove themselves, venturing into a journey far greater than imagined. Ambitious and brave, they will stop at nothing to achieve their goals.

programme.desc: The brand new 30-minute, 8-episode lifestyle docu-series,

programme.title: Kongfulicious
programme.desc: The director visited eight cities in China known for their cuisine to find unknown but distinctive restaurants scattered throughout the country to discover the essence of Chinese cuisine. 节目带领观众打卡8座性格之城、探访8处江湖美食地，扎根城市街头，在繁华的市井小巷，寻找“江湖厨神”的诞生，探寻每座城市最受欢迎的江湖菜馆，品味普通人最真挚的生活热情。

programme.title: Kinship
programme.desc: Brothers, Chen Anping (Yao Wenlong) and Anxin (Chen Tianwen) run Da Ying Jia. Together, they expanded their foot reflexology centre from its humble beginnings to a successful chain-store. But beneath the calm surface of the 25 years family business lie secrets and struggles. programme.title: The Heartland Hero
programme.desc: Former loan shark Mao Ge had his leg broken by his enemy after he was released from prison. He started a second-hand goods business with Yiyuan, an ex-convict too. Qiu Jingwen, once a delinquent Mao Ge dated, sublet her toast shop space to Mao reluctantly. Jingwen’s cousin Qingtian, a prison officer, helps out at the toast shop and she is skeptical of Mao and Yiyuan turning over a new leaf... 人称猫哥的前阿窿刚出狱就被仇家打断腿，在好兄弟钟亿元出狱后，一起开了一家二手货店“邻里帮”。不得已把土司店面分租给猫哥的邱静雯，竟是当年和他一起出双入对的小太妹MoMo。静雯的表妹包晴天是监狱官，经常到店里帮忙，始终对猫哥和亿元存有偏见，不相信他们会坏人做好事。但谁说旧货与人生，重来一次不能更美？

programme.title: Taste Of Life
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. programme.title: Meals On Mission
programme.desc: The outbreak of Covid19 has prompted many to step forward to put out meals in community kitchens to serve the underprivileged. Celebrity Michelle Chia joins these kitchens to reveal the laborious challenges involved. Will she triumph the ultimate Meals on Mission test to helm the kitchen for a day? 新冠疫情期间，不少新加坡人发挥爱心加入社区厨房的工作队伍，为弱势群体备餐送餐。艺人谢韵仪当起社区厨房义工，亲身体验当中一切苦与乐。她必须学习厨房一整天的运作，然后扛起煮饭送饭的终极任务，她办得到吗？

programme.title: Neighbourhood Fixer
programme.desc: Darren tours Chinatown with illustrator Francis. A group of volunteers who set up gourmet website to help mothers from low-income families to earn extra income and set up reading plans for kids. Visit two young hawkers who provide free meals for the elderly as well as a shoemaker and a scissors maker. 绘本作家虎威带着明伦走访他小时候的牛车水。被遗忘的惹兰固哥社区，一群社工为低收入家庭的妈妈创设美食网站，赚取外快，也为孩子们设立阅读计划。走访两位为老人提供免费餐食的年轻小贩和坚持手艺的鞋匠和剪刀匠。

programme.title: Secrets And Lies
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Chairman Wu experiences a heart attack and collapses. Zhuyuan wants to know what really happened to Chairman Wu, so she sneaks into his study room to retrieve the spy camera.

programme.title: Poisonous Passion
programme.desc: Dr. Parichat Khunanan, the epitome of the perfect woman, is a bright, beautiful and successful life coach. She has captured the heart of businessman Payu. Her perfect life is suddenly threatened when she is confronted and provoked by her dark past love entanglement. She soon embarks on a downward spiraled path of vengeance against the people who wronged and betrayed her - her past love, Trin, and his wife Pimpaka.

programme.title: Its Beautiful Now
programme.desc: The Lee brothers upset their family after they announce that they will never get married. Things change when the elders promise to give an apartment to the son who gets wed first. 此剧讲述在回避恋爱和结婚的时代，李家三兄弟为了占据家庭长辈们留给他们的公寓而寻找伴侣的故事。

programme.title: The Flash Band
programme.desc: In the program, the musicians perofrms in a music festival in the form of a band. In the process, they constantly adjust and reorganise,in order to smoothen the edges to becoming a professional and outstanding band. 节目中音乐人们以乐队形式参加公演音乐节，他们在过程中不断地磨合、重组，碰撞出一首首突破经典的音乐作品，最终形成一支闪光的乐队。

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Sleepless Nights
programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.title: A Far Shore
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Midnight At The Paradise
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: On Our Watch
programme.desc: Arturo unsuspectingly introduces an algorithm that cost him his job, fiancee and his friends. In his loneliness, he grows attached to Stella, a hologram, who he might lose if he can’t renew his subscription. Will Arturo find love and freedom again?

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: Lahore Bhojnalay
programme.desc: A man on a mission right in the heart of enemy lines, gets help from a stranger, who sees right through his disguise.

programme.title: Dad Got Grounded
programme.desc: Paul is a great pilot, but after breaking his promise to retire early to care for their son, his wife leaves him. Faced with having to take care of their son and his two other children by himself, Paul must show that he is a good father to win her back.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Untold Legends
programme.desc: Vickie Dutton, Doris Young and Daisy Devan may not be names that mean much at first glance but these women changed Singapores fashion, film and music profoundly. In this series, we dig into our collective amnesia and tell the stories of these pioneering women that were lost in history. Filmmaker Larissa Ong goes on an intimate journey to rediscover the life of Vickie Dutton, a fashion designer and Singapores first Malay model. As she creates a contemporary fashion spread inspired by Vickies work, secrets from her past are revealed. Doris Young aka Marrie Lee played the role of 1970s B-movie icon, Cleopatra Wong but vanished after catapulting to fame. Years later, we uncover her comeback through an amateur film club. Actor and singer Rebekah Dorai pieces together surviving memories of Daisy Devan, an artist manager rumoured to have shaped Singapores pop music golden era through more than 3,000 records.

programme.title: Food . Energy . Water .
programme.desc: Climate change, supply chain disruptions and geopolitical uncertainties are hurting the worlds access to its 3 most critical resources - Food, Energy, and Water. Economies are increasingly vulnerable to supply shocks and it has become a security concern for countries everywhere. This 3-part documentary series examines the impact of supply insecurity on countries and citizens, and the search for solutions to safeguard access. In Svalbard, Norway, a seed vault stores seeds from almost every country in the world, while agricultural scientists work in their labs to develop more climate resilient crops. In 2017, residents of Cape Town were mobilized to conserve water in a bid to avert a water crisis. programme.title: Takdir Cinta Dhia
programme.desc: Fayyad finds out the truth about the downfall of his fathers business. Dhia questions Fayyad about her fathers death.

programme.title: Raja Bundle
programme.desc: Just as everything is going Asris way, he makes one impetuous decision that makes him go into unchartered waters of live streaming. Asri is left with no choice but to work with a group of home-based sellers to stay afloat. His personal life is in shambles as his son, Amirul sees him as a failure and his ex-wife, Hani becomes more exasperated with him. Hidup Asri kelihatan berjalan dengan lancar tetapi satu keputusan yang terburu-buru membuatnya terpaksa mencuba bidang lain iaitu jualan dalam talian. Asri tiada pilihan dan terpaksa bekerjasama dengan sekumpulan penjual HBB. Hidup peribadinya semakin kucar-kacir kerana anaknya, Amirul, menganggapnya sebagai bapa yang gagal dan bekas isterinya, Hani, semakin marah dengannya.

programme.title: Isteri Misteri
programme.desc: Tells the story of Rizal, a young man who receives a shamans prediction that his wife wants to kill him. With the help of his assistant, Jun, he has to save himself and prevent his wifes plan. However, the main problem is that he has three wives.

programme.title: Dewi
programme.desc: When her husband, Bayu, dies in an accident, Dewi, learns that he has a child with another woman, Abi, and decides to take care of him.

programme.title: Kak Lina Ter-Over Take Over
programme.desc: A brand new show with Kak Lina, as we follow Kak Lina as she takeover a celebs home bringing along her brand of chaos-ness, in this reality show.

programme.title: Sabarlah Duhai Hati
programme.desc: Firas life has changed since the birth of her youngest brother, Danish when she was 20 years old. After 4 years, Fira had to take care of Danish when their parents died. There is no one else to depend on, Fira has to take care of the young Danish. While reeling from a new phase in her life, Fira is proposed to by Affan. However, their marriage is opposed by Affans grandmother and his cousin, Nadia.

programme.title: Aku Seorang Perempuan
programme.desc: After Fareezs death, Siti Noraisya decides to make a comeback to the recording industry. Ehsans confesses to Siti Noraisya that he has feelings for her.

programme.title: Projek L.I.T.
programme.desc: Projek L.I.T. is an edutainment series where our 10-14 year olds will discover about science, mathematics, cooking and Malay proverbs. Get ready to widen your knowledge and be entertained by our fun hosts - Zhin, Sabrina and Farah.

programme.title: Janji Sedap
programme.sub-title: Ep 16 Cooking for elderly / Masakan untuk Warga Emas
programme.desc: Whether you are living the life, running your own business, a fitness enthusiast or even living on your own. You will still need to eat! Yes, food delivery is convenient but there are days when one needs to eat healthy, fast and simple food or simply, a cheaper alternative and to bring the kitchen to good use. Sometimes there would be days of crazy ideas when western food might just taste better when fused with traditional taste. How do you reckon pasta with sambal prawns or well-done steak with sambal belacan?! And don’t even start on the random cravings for mum’s food. Follow our very own Chef Andri in this new cooking show call Janji Sedap as he whips up simple, fast and satisfying food that revolves around your busy schedule. The best thing is, this guy knows everything there is to know about cooking! You will be his priority and what he comes up with could be your new favourite dish. He will prove that cooking is fun and simple, and now everyone can cook! Tidak kisah la jikalau kita sedang berkembangkan kerjaya, menguruskan bisnis sendiri, minat bersenam atau tinggal bersendirian, kita pasti tetap harus makan! Walaupun servis penghantar makanan itu senang di dapati, tapi tetap mesti ada hari yang kita akan mengidamkan makanan sihat, inginkan makanan ringan dan senang, atau hanya inginkan dapur berasap! Ikuti Cef Andri dalam rancangan memasak terbaru, Janji Sedap dan dia akan menunjukan cara-cara memasak yang murah, senang dan janji sedap!

programme.title: Rajuk Karina
programme.desc: Karina and Mizan are cousins and they have never been at odds. Similarly, their extended family relationship seems to have no boundaries between the two families. programme.title: Janji Sedap
programme.sub-title: Ep 16 Cooking for elderly / Masakan untuk Warga Emas
programme.desc: Whether you are living the life, running your own business, a fitness enthusiast or even living on your own. You will still need to eat! Yes, food delivery is convenient but there are days when one needs to eat healthy, fast and simple food or simply, a cheaper alternative and to bring the kitchen to good use. Sometimes there would be days of crazy ideas when western food might just taste better when fused with traditional taste. How do you reckon pasta with sambal prawns or well-done steak with sambal belacan?! And don’t even start on the random cravings for mum’s food. Follow our very own Chef Andri in this new cooking show call Janji Sedap as he whips up simple, fast and satisfying food that revolves around your busy schedule. The best thing is, this guy knows everything there is to know about cooking! You will be his priority and what he comes up with could be your new favourite dish. He will prove that cooking is fun and simple, and now everyone can cook! Tidak kisah la jikalau kita sedang berkembangkan kerjaya, menguruskan bisnis sendiri, minat bersenam atau tinggal bersendirian, kita pasti tetap harus makan! Walaupun servis penghantar makanan itu senang di dapati, tapi tetap mesti ada hari yang kita akan mengidamkan makanan sihat, inginkan makanan ringan dan senang, atau hanya inginkan dapur berasap! Ikuti Cef Andri dalam rancangan memasak terbaru, Janji Sedap dan dia akan menunjukan cara-cara memasak yang murah, senang dan janji sedap!

programme.desc: Gitanjali’s universe collides with a like-minded soul called Shiva, whose one love in life is dance. programme.title: Thilaanaa
programme.desc: Gitanjali’s universe collides with a like-minded soul called Shiva, whose one love in life is dance. Through Shiva, Gitanjali meets 5 girls from different walks of life, deterred from practicing dance. Through Deva, Gitanjali meets Shakthi and his almost defunct dance group. Determined to reconnect them to their purpose, Gitanjali rediscovers herself along the way. Their lives unfold like a dance repertoire, with each movement bringing them towards the next stage of their existence.

programme.title: Enna Kodumai
programme.desc: One mans misery is another mans entertainment. Enna Kodumai is one of the most hilarious and off the cuff travelogue series to unfold on Vasantham. Say hello to a new travel show that is witty, cynical, outrageous and utterly amusing, Enna Kodumai. The series takes you around the world witnessing the 13 majestic wonders of the world. The unpredictability of this travel is helmed by the insane producer. Who makes seemingly unassuming and innocent requests of the host.
